mapper.select: SELECT P.product_seq, P.product_name, P.product_amount, P.product_weight, P.product_price, C.category_name, G.grade_name FROM product P LEFT JOIN category C ON P.category_seq = C.category_seq LEFT JOIN grade G ON P.grade_seq = G.grade_seq

SELECT P.product_seq, P.product_name, P.product_amount, P.product_weight, P.product_price, C.category_name, G.grade_name FROM product P LEFT JOIN category C ON P.category_seq = C.category_seq LEFT JOIN grade G ON P.grade_seq = G.grade_seq WHERE P.category_seq = #{categorySeq}
SELECT C.category_seq, C.category_name FROM category C
select product_name from product where product_seq = #{ productSeq }
